beast2tpPipeline 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
    • Using the BEAST2 - TransPhylo Pipeline with Maximum Clade Credibility Trees
Given fasta files and corresponding metadata, this package goes through the process of splitting fasta files into SNP clusters, creating an XML file for BEAST2 (constrained to a particular model - use BEAUti otherwise), running BEAST2, running TransPhylo, and then doing some kind of regression with the TransPhylo results. This package was developed with the specific application of the Kopanyo project with TB data, so some of it is highly specific and not very transferable.
